''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King]]'' | imdb = [https://www.imdb.com/name/nm0190744/ Profile] }} New Zealand actor '''Marton Csokas''' (born [[30 June|June 30]]th, [[1966]]) played [[Celeborn]] in ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]]'' and ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King|The Return of the King]]''. His last name is Hungarian and is pronounced Cho-Kash. ==Quotes== {{quote|Celeborn is more fixed in his beliefs and methods than Galadriel, which is his failing, perhaps. As a team, they work well, although apparently they only have sex once every 2,000 years or so.|E-Online July 2000}} == External links == * {{WP|Marton Csokas}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Csokas, Marton}} [[Category:Actors and actresses]] [[Category:New Zealand people]] [[Category:People by name]] [[Category:The Lord of the Rings (film series) cast]] [[de:Marton Csokas]] [[fi:Marton Csokas]]
